articles.description:
RT Harpreet Singh | happysingh.crypto/lens
Summarising 2023
- Became active in @developer_dao (Best decision)
- Got the Full Stack Web3 Dev Internship @zerufinance 
- Ambassador @arbitrumcore 
- Speaker for @Girlscript1 
- Attended the @arweaveindia Hacker House
- Won at @ETHIndiaco 1st IRL Hackathon
- Made a lot of frens

https://www.abstracting.org/

This person will work with myself and @chronear to put content like those that we have been putting lately on sharding, DA, and anything NEAR related.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
#30daysoftext Day 30
The final topic 🎉🎉🎉🎉
Explain the benefits of your favorite zero-knowledge technology. ✨
It can be a short article, a Twitter thread, or even just a tweet. Just ensure to explain it well.
Reply with a link to the text, so we can find it 🤫
